title: Banks as Patient Debt Investors
content: - 17 -   I have argued that there is a synergy between banks’ stable funding model and   their investing in assets that have modest fundamental risk but whose prices can fall   significantly below fundamental values in a bad state of the world.  This synergy helps   explain both why deposit-taking banks might have a comparative advantage at making   information-intensive loans and, at the same time, why they tend to hold the specific   types of securities that they do.
